document: THE RELATIONSHIPS OF OCCUPATIONAL STRESS AND CERTAIN OTHER VARIABLES TO JOB SATISFACTION OF LICENSED PROFESSIONAL COUNSELORS IN VIRGINIA by Clell R. Clemons, Jr. Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of DOCTOR OF EDUCATION in Counseling and Student Personnel Services APPROVED: Carl O. McDaniels, Chairman Dean L. Hummel Marilyn V. Lichtman Martin Gerstein Hild Getz October, 1988 Blacksburg, Virginia
